title: Step 1 – Ask the Right Questions Follow-Up
description: For leaders who have completed the Jackier Method but are struggling to fully implement Step 1.

questions.text: I clearly identified the leadership challenge I was facing.
I asked questions that dug beneath the surface of the problem.
I challenged my assumptions or blind spots.
Where might your questions have been too shallow, biased, or reactive? How could you ask differently?
Would you like to discuss your challenges with Eric? If yes, please provide your email.

title: Step 2 – Identify the Real Issues Follow-Up
description: For leaders who have completed the Jackier Method but are struggling to fully implement Step 2.

questions.text: I distinguished symptoms from root causes.
I looked at both internal and external contributing factors.
I sought feedback or multiple perspectives when needed.
What issues might you have overlooked or misdiagnosed? What feedback did you ignore or avoid?
Would you like to discuss your challenges with Eric? If yes, please provide your email.

title: Step 3 – Find the Best Solution Follow-Up
description: For leaders who have completed the Jackier Method but are struggling to fully implement Step 3.

questions.text: I evaluated more than one possible course of action.
I considered how each option aligns with my values and long-term vision.
I chose a solution that balanced impact and feasibility.
Are you stuck trying to find the 'perfect' solution? Have you ignored an obvious or simple one?
Would you like to discuss your challenges with Eric? If yes, please provide your email.

title: Step 4 – Execute and Succeed Follow-Up
description: For leaders who have completed the Jackier Method but are struggling to fully implement Step 4.

questions.text: I created a clear plan and took immediate action.
I tracked progress and adjusted as needed.
I stayed committed even when results didn't come instantly.
Where did your execution fall off? Was it motivation, structure, support, or something else?
Would you like to discuss your challenges with Eric? If yes, please provide your email.
